headline: Yvonne van der Laan honored with 2024 Winthrop-Sears medal
summary: Distinction recognizes top innovators and entrepreneurs in the world of chemistry Yvonne van der Laan, EVP, circular and low carbon solutions Yvonne van der Laan, EVP, circular and low carbon solutions HOUSTON, Dec. 06, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) today announced that Yvonne van der Laan, executive vice president of circular and low carbon solutions (CLCS), has been awarded the prestigious Winthrop-Sears medal by The Chemists' Club.
